Subject: OTP use error
Description: I attach "OTP.pdf" to detail de problem with screenshot. We think that this problem begin after updating the console and agents to last version.
Solution_Comment__c: What you see is not a bug. When you enter a CAP OTP code, epp-client does not load CAP policies. You can see the "Skipping policy load because a CAP password is in effect." message in the logs, and also the "OTP status: Active CAP: x..." message. So when a CAP OTP code is active, epp-client does not populate the active policies list, and when this list is empty, the CAP tab is hidden.
